title: Principles of Thermodynamics
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of thermodynamics. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Introduction to Analysis
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in analysis. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Applied Dynamics
description: Comprehensive study of dynamics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Thermodynamics
description: Comprehensive study of thermodynamics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Ethics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in ethics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Ethics
description: Advanced exploration of ethics covering current research and industry practices.

title: Advanced Analysis
description: Advanced exploration of analysis covering current research and industry practices.

title: Special Topics in Controls
description: Comprehensive study of controls with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Special Topics in Project Management
description: Advanced exploration of project management covering current research and industry practices.
